item.description: Join us for a lively discussion of articles from La Voz Hispana; Identidad Latina; and El Registro. These three Spanish language newspapers are readily available locally, and also online (www.lavozhispanact.com; www.identidadlatina.com; and registroct.com). Margaret will start off the discussion presenting one article for discussion. If you can, bring one or two recent articles that interest you.

group.name: The Hartford Spanish Language Meetup Group

item.name: June Tertulia
